CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Skyline Station?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Skyline Station is arc {West Cross}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Skyline Station?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Skyline Station is arc {East Junction}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Skyline Station} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Valley Terminal} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from West Cross to Skyline Station in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Junction to Valley Terminal in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from West Cross to East Junction in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Valley Terminal and East Junction in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Valley Terminal and East Junction is {64}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between West Cross and East Junction in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between West Cross and East Junction is {102}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Valley Terminal?
SC.A: The total flow output from Valley Terminal is {158}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by East Junction?
SC.A: The total flow input by East Junction is {193}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 125? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {127} from {Skyline Station} to {Valley Terminal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 36? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {18} from {East Junction} to {Skyline Station}, a flow of {35} from {Valley Terminal} to {East Junction}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 50 and 100? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {65} from {West Cross} to {Skyline Station}, a flow of {99} from {Skyline Station} to {West Cross}, a flow of {64} from {East Junction} to {Valley Terminal}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Skyline Station to West Cross or from West Cross to East Junction?
NC.A: The flow from {West Cross} to {East Junction} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Valley Terminal to East Junction, from East Junction to Valley Terminal, or from Skyline Station to East Junction?
NC.A: The flow from {East Junction} to {Valley Terminal} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Skyline Station}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Skyline Station} and {Valley Terminal}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Skyline Station, Arc Valley Terminal, Arc West Cross, Arc East Junction}.
